archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_0792
archimate:Requirement.documentation: As a Direct Cost Specialist - We want the revenue invoice and supporting file automatically emailed to our partners. We also need to be able to download these files. Source Kenan billing generated PDF invoice automatically saved online, Supporting CDR summary file is available in EDW as well as ICT

properties.value: Looks like a requirement for IPB KH: agree, been handed to IPB Moved to seperate excel for IPB

properties.key: Applies to Consumer only, Business only, or Both
